snippet: WilmerHale said on Monday that it had hired Anjan Sahni, a senior federal prosecutor in the United States attorney’s office in Manhattan.
abstract: WilmerHale says it has hired Anjan Sahni, senior federal prosecutor in United States attorney's office in Manhattan; names him partner in its white-collar and securities enforcement practices.
lead_paragraph: WilmerHale said on Monday that it had hired Anjan Sahni, a senior federal prosecutor in the United States attorney’s office in Manhattan.

headline.main: Wall Street Prosecutor Will Join WilmerHale
headline.print_headline: Wall Street Prosecutor Will Join WilmerHale

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Wilmer Cutler Pickering Hale and Dorr LLP
